A toothbrush that comes with a revolutionary sonic technology: with up to 35,000 brush strokes per minute removing up to 99% stains and plaque. 1-YEAR warranty included. Multiple toothbrush head choices: with two soft and two hard teethbrush head,it is suitable for oral cavity with different sensitivity.

Our model is wearing a size medium blazer, and usually takes a size medium/38L shirt. He is 6’2 1/2” (189cm) tall with a 38” (96 cm) chest and a 31” (78 cm) waist.

  • Regular fit
  • Notched lapels
  • Twin button front fastening

  • Centre-back vent
